mapper.insert: insert into studyboard(num, writer, subject, passwd, reg_date, content, boardid, filename, filesize) values(#{num},#{writer},#{subject},#{passwd}, sysdate, #{content},#{boardid},#{filename},#{filesize})
mapper.update: update studyboard set readcount = readcount +1 where num=#{num} and boardid =#{boardid}
mapper.select: select * from studyboard where num =#{num} and boardid =#{boardid}
mapper.update: update studyboard set writer=#{writer}, email=#{email},subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where num=#{num} and passwd=#{passwd}
mapper.delete: delete from studyboard where num=#{num} and passwd=#{passwd}
